phrase.item: When I wrote my first book in Wakhi, the purpose of it was, so that whenever, as you are now, foreigners come, they would get the books so they can learn and have an understanding about our language.
Scholars are interested and ask about our languages whenever they come.
The whole point is to make sure the language doesn't disappear.
Instead, our language should spread more.
Currently the Wakhi language is spoken here, in Afghanistan, China and Pakistan.
In total, people in four countries speak the Wakhi Language.
We should definitely try to spread it so that many people can [hear] it.
Nowadays Wakhi people live in many other countries. As you see,
some are living in Russia, right? They don't know the Wakhi language, when they come here they speak Russian.
How come a Wakhi child doesn't know his language?
He's not supposed to forget it, he should be taught in the family that it is [his] father's and grandfather's tounge
They are not supposed to lose their culture and tradition, and
especially not their language.
Even some people who come from Dushanbe have already forgotten their language. In the family they didn't speak Wakhi with the child [growing up], that's why he doesn't know.
That is not good.
What is our people's strength and pride?
In general, every nation's pride is their culture and traditions, and [their] language, right?
And their history.
Those things should never disappear.
When those things disappear the nation disappears.
Just like that!
